content: Unbelievable. A Jr. enlisted man saves his team by firing up the enemy with his hog, is tied up, shot in both ankles, escapes to friendly lines and sends for help. Is given only an ARCOM with V and a SGT Major gets a silver star for something he didn't even do. Hello out there is anybody listening? Once again Justice in this case would be that the Jr. Enlisted man be given his POW status, the Silver Star, promotion to SSG with all back pay and put on 90% disability by the VA. As for the SGM he should be stripped of all rank, pay, benefits, ordered to pay a fine of $467,000 and on National TV he should have his nose and three of his toes cut off just as a reminder.
reply: Unbelievable. A Jr. enlisted man saves his team by firing up the enemy with his hog, is tied up, shot in both ankles, escapes to friendly lines and sends for help. content: I have heard more than once that the VA has twice as many people claiming VN Vet Status as were actually there. I can see how this happens, I have had to correct quite a few people at the VA who seemed to eager to add things to my file that do not belong there. I found that some people whose jobs were to listen to people, were more concerned with getting the visit/Appt. over with and pouring that next cup of coffee. Nothing is lower than the poser that has never served, yet we have Veterans who have Awards and Decorations earned wholly on their own, who decide to embellish their service with unearned objects to adorn their uniform. Quantum materiae materietur marmota monax si marmota monax materiam possit materiari?

content: Greywolfghost; I disagree with you. Federal Prison is not a bad place to be. In fact if things get so bad in this country that I can't make it any longer than I have a plan that would put me into a Federal Prison for the rest of my life. I mean why not? I get away from my family which has a motto of "Give me, give me, give me," I get three hots and a cot each day. I can take classes, go out in the yard and play ball, lift weights, (ugh), play softball, read books and magazines, watch TV, play cards, and get medical and dental free of charge. Why reward these low life's for these types of crimes? Send them down to Florida, Louisans, Mississippi to work camps and chain gangs. Tattoo them behind their ears as Felons and amputate a nose, ear, or their bottom lip. That way they will always have a reminder and everyone else will know what type of low life they really are.

Tattoo them behind their ears as Felons and amputate a nose, ear, or their bottom lip. That way they will always have a reminder and everyone else will know what type of low life they really are.
reply: I didn't use the term "bad" - I said "right" place. VA hospitals are for Veterans with legit claims, the last I heard. Fed Prison is for azzholes - with no permission to come an go - Ain't that what they're for? Separate budgets, separate purpose - I'd shoot the bassturds if I was boss, bu that's why no one would/should ever vote for me - - Wandering and Wondering
title: THE LOWEST FORMS OF LIFE ON EARTH
